Package model.state

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
model.state.Phase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Edit, End, Play
public class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
State of the State pattern. Here implemented as a abstract class.

In this example, the states represent states in the board game Risk. There are many states, and even a hierarchy of states:

Phase Edit Play Startup LoadMap AddPlayer AssignCountry MainPlay IssueOrder OrderExecution End

In each state, nextState() is defined so that it goes down in the above list, except for Fortify, which goes back to Reinforcement state.

See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected MainPlayController d_Ml
    Contains a reference to the State of the GameEngine so that the state object can change the state of the GameEngine to transition between states.
